title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw
name: Neotw
author: oeyoews
readme:
## Intro :tada: > A modern style notebook based on `tiddlywiki`. @oeyoews > Here is a [» demo «](https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw)
Intro 🤖 > NEOTW is a concise and efficient article publishing platform. We support bilingual publishing in both Chinese and English, and provide a toggle between reading mode and editing mode, so that you can easily edit while reading articles. We also support emoji syntax, allowing you to add more expressions and emotional color to your articles. You can switch between different layouts through the URL, making your reading experience more flexible. In addition, we automatically switch between night/day mode based on the system, and you can also switch modes through the URL. We also support Zen mode, allowing you to enjoy reading in a quiet environment. On NEOTW, you can publish your own articles and comment on others' articles. We automatically display recently created articles, keeping you up to date with the latest news on the platform. To make your reading more beautiful, we also support automatic spacing between Chinese and English, making your typesetting more neat and beautiful. Additionally, we support title aliases to make your titles more exquisite. Welcome to NEOTW, let's enjoy the joy of reading and sharing together! @Chatgpt > This is a document created using TiddlyWiki, which can be opened using TiddlyWiki 5.2.6 or higher. Its main purpose is to introduce Neotw, which includes custom CSS and some plugins that can be used to enhance the appearance and functionality of TiddlyWiki. The document provides detailed instructions on how to install and use the Neotw, as well as how to customize settings and add plugins. Additionally, the document offers some common questions and useful links regarding TiddlyWiki. If you are interested in customizing TiddlyWiki themes and developing plugins, you may find useful information within the TiddlyWiki community. @Chatgpt
## Features :sparkles: - 随机展示文章 - 文章标题支持中英双语言切换 - 支持阅读模式编辑模式之间的切换 - 支持 emoji 语法 - 支持通过 url 切换多种布局 - 根据系统自动切换夜间/日间模式, 支持 url 切换，例如 https://neotw.oeyoewl.top?mode=dark - 支持禅模式 - 支持评论 - 自动展示最近创建的文章 - 中英文之间自动添加空格，排版更美观 - 标题支持别名 - ... > **Warning** `Neotw` 部分功能暂时还未单独做成插件，或者部分功能依赖与其他插件, 不建议单独使用 ## Installation :package: > **Note** > require git and npm and not compatible vanilla theme > 不建议使用 root-tiddler 参数(虽然使用有很多好处) ```bash git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw cd neotw && npm install # install packages npm run start # start tiddlywiki on https://localhost:8099 ``` ## Deploy :gear: ## FileStruct :open_file_folder:
FileStruct ```bash Neotw ├──📁archive ├──📁CITATION.cff ├──📁dev ├──📁dist ├──📁files ├──📁img ├──📁LICENSE ├──📁makefile ├──📁netlify.toml ├──📁node_modules ├──📁output ├──📁package.json ├──📁patch ├──📁README.md ├──📁scripts ├──📁src ├──📁static ├──📁templates ├──📁test ├──📁tiddlers ├──📁tiddlywiki.info ├──📁vercel.json └──📁yarn.lock # This structure may not be up to date ```
## Online Preview :eyes:
Preview - [Slides](https://neotw.oeyoewl.top/#neotw-reveal-js) - [main](https://neotw.oeyoewl.top) - [github page](https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw) - [tiddlyhost](https://neotw.tiddlyhost.com) - [vercel](https://neotw.vercel.app) - [netlify](https://neotw.netlify.app)
## Repobeats
![Alt](https://repobeats.axiom.co/api/embed/3afafedb553e9729995586198853fa9a3c473e90.svg 'Repobeats analytics image')
↥︎

title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-hitokoto
name: neotw-hitokoto
author: oeyoews
readme: <$image source={{{ [[][https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-]] [get[version]] [[-red?style=flat&logo=dev.to&logoColor=red]] +[join[]]}}} /> <$image source={{{ [[][https://img.shields.io/badge/Author-]] [get[author]] [[-lightblue?style=flat]] +[join[]]}}} /> !! 一言(online) > 使用一言api, 需要联网 {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-hitokoto/modal-id}} !! 一言tiddlywiki版(local) > 使用chatgpt 制卡，txt to json 脚本由chatgpt提供, 以下是制卡规则 * 英文名人名言 * 长度控制在20 到35 之间 * 不使用双引号 * 来源使用@分离 {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-hitokoto/surfing}} > 使用json格式存储数据， 可以随时更改句子内容 @chatgpt > [[Random Sentences|$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-hitokoto/random-sentences.json]] {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-hitokoto/ohitokoto}} * 每隔一段时间自动刷新, 点击也可刷新 !! usage * 如果想要隐藏当前tiddler的hitokoto,可以添加字段hitokoto:no !! param * enableClick * refreshHitokoto * refreshTime !! TODO * 使用脚本自动生成json from txt or excel * 传入参数, 支持自定义样式, id * 支持modal * ~~使用级联保持widget在末尾, 不受其他viewtemplate影响~~ !! NOTE * 暂时还不支持静态文件编译

title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-fancybox
author: oeyoews
name: Tiddlywiki Fancybox
readme: <$image source={{{ [[][https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-]] [get[version]] [[-red?style=flat&logo=dev.to&logoColor=red]] +[join[]]}}} /> !! Readme * [[Source|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/tree/main/dev/plugins/tiddlywiki-fancybox]] * [[Tiddlyhost site|https://fancybox-oeyoews.tiddlyhost.com]] !! Features * 点击图片自动放大(全部支持， 0 配置) * support download images, fullscreen, custom style and shortcuts, * support local images online images, mix that is also supported !! Advance Usage <$button> Usage <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-fancybox/example"/> !! Note * 不建议使用过大的图片， 会造成卡顿 * need refresh on installed this fancybox plugin * if you use splashscreen, please remove `remove-when-wiki-loaded` class, otherwise this plugin will not work normally [[warn|https://github.com/Jermolene/TiddlyWiki5/search?q=tc-remove-when-wiki-loaded]] !! TODO * support filter

title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus
description: A Commenting System Powered By Github Discussions
author: oeyoews
name: Tiddlywiki Giscus
readme: <$image source={{{ [[][https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-]] [get[version]] [[-red?style=flat&logo=dev.to&logoColor=red]] +[join[]]}}} /> <$image source={{{ [[][https://img.shields.io/badge/Author-]] [get[author]] [[-lightblue?style=flat]] +[join[]]}}} /> <$button> Config Giscus <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/giscus-config"/> <$button setTitle=<> setField="text" setTo="contents"> Contents <$button setTitle=<> setField="text" setTo="explore"> Explore > 💎 A Commenting System Powered By Github Discussions. Let Visitors Leave Comments And Reactions On Your Site With Github! This Project Is Strongly Inspired By Utterances. !! Usage * Ctrl-Shift-G 显示评论， 或者点击界面上的这个图标 {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon-gem}} !! NOTE * 由于使用modal评论， filter 的配置项不再使用， 也没有使用的必要了， 仅作为保留 * 如果想要使用旧版的1.2.1, 卸载此插件的依赖项即可`$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/focused-tiddler` 或者卸载hotzone插件 !! TODO * support switch giscus to others, such as twikoo, and utterances * switch theme on comments top(select box) dark_dimmed * 统一button样式 * 提供未配置检测警告 * 提供依赖检测警告

title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips
author: oeyoews
name: Tiddlywiki Tips
readme: <$image source={{{ [[][https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-]] [get[version]] [[-red?style=social]] +[join[]]}}} /> <$button setTitle=<> setField="text" setTo="contents"> Contents <$button setTitle=<> setField="text" setTo="explore"> Explore !! Tiddlywiki Tips * [[Source|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/tree/main/dev/plugins/tiddlywiki-tips]] * [[Demo|https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw]] !! 介绍 * 点击刷新随机文本, 默认自动刷新时间间隔为30s * 可以自己添加文本, 文本的class为.tw-tip, 可自定义 * 最小格式见下方 ```json [ { "id": "1", "from": "文本来源", "hitokoto": "文本" }, { "id": "2", "from": "sentences", "hitokoto": "It's a beautiful day." } ] ``` > id 是标记用的， 可选参数， hitokoto是必选参数, from可以留空 !! Example <$button> Click me <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/ui/modal"/> > 注： 本插件由neotw-hitokoto单独抽离而出, 此插件只是作为一个例子， 后续更新请查看neotw-hitokoto插件 !! 用法 ``` <$tw-tip /> ``` 在tiddler里面嵌入以上内容即可 > 如果需要添加大量文本， 建议使用chatgpt制卡(如果可以), 以下是本插件文本默认的制卡规则, 仅仅作为参考建议 * 英文名人名言 * 长度控制在20 到35 之间 * 不使用双引号 * 来源使用@分离 <$button> 添加文本 <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/random-sentences.json" />
